Name: Drift 1969
About the game: Become the best rally driver, you have the choice of 4 best cars. -Muscle car1969 very powerful car -pg86 mk2 -the true legend of the drift -bmg v34 -made in Germany,comfortable and powerful -Sunline GTE- one of the best cars for drift. The driving experience provides extremely fun and the drifts feel perfect, accompanied with the engine sounds and gear shifting. Drift and score points. Race against very demanding opponents
